taxon_identification.taxon_hierarchy: family rosaceae;tribe rubeae;genus rubus;subgenus eubatus;section discolores;species bifrons;

treatment.other_name: (having two kinds of leaf; the lower quinate, the upper ternate)
treatment.description: Similar to no. 11; coarse canes glabrous; prickles straight; well developed inflorescence pyramidal, its strong prickles straight.
treatment.habitat_elevation_distribution_or_ecolog: Roadsides, waste places and old house-sites, Fla. to La., n., locally, to R.I., Tenn. and Mo. Fl. May-July; fr. July, Aug.
